statement.p: Note the graph shows one second.
What is the frequency of this wave?
What is the period of this wave?
What is the amplitude of this wave?

solution.p: The frequency is 3, because there are 3 copies of the curve from 0 to 1.
The period is 0.33333333333333, because one copy of the curve is completed by 0.33333333333333. Also period is \displaystyle\frac{{1}}{{3}}={0.33333333333333}.
The amplitude is 1, because the curve oscillates between -1 and 1.
